FieldInformation.Hint: Will not increase 3d rendering resolution, but will make UI look fairly decent on highres screens.
Enabling this will control both guns with the device specified for the left gun. Disable to use two seperate devices, one for each gun.
Enabling this will allow you to set buttons instead of an axis for the left stick. Only used for XInput/DInput. This way you can map the left stick to a Dpad, for example.
Enabling this will allow you to set buttons instead of an axis for the right stick. Only used for XInput/DInput. This way you can map the right stick to a Dpad, for example.

JoystickButtons.Hint: D-PAD is used to target enemies.
D-PAD is used to target enemies.
